meanings.definition: A mild, creamy Indian dish made with yogurt, cream, and various spices.
meanings.sent1: My mom cooked a delicious korma for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty is chicken korma.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled korma on my shirt, but it made for a tasty stain.
meanings.sent4: The korma was a soothing blanket of flavors on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the korma filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of curry typically made with meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: We ordered a vegetable korma for our vegetarian friend.
meanings.sent2: The lamb korma at the Indian restaurant is always a hit.
meanings.sent3: The korma curry was so good, it made me dance a little in my seat.
meanings.sent4: The korma curry was a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavors of the korma curry lingered on my palate long after the meal.
